fields.Title: Test Feature - Using Short Field Names
fields.Description:
Testing Field Name Resolution

This spec file uses short field names instead of fully qualified reference names to demonstrate the automatic resolution feature.
fields.AcceptanceCriteria:
• Field name resolver works correctly
  • Short names are resolved to fully qualified names
  • Both short and fully qualified names are supported

fields.System.Title: Test Feature - Using Fully Qualified Names
fields.System.Description:
Mixed Field Name Format

This work item uses fully qualified field names to show that both formats work together.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
• Fully qualified names still work
  • Can mix short and qualified names
